column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Katara ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Zuko told me what you did .
#Text=Or what you did n't do , I guess .
#Text=I 'm proud of you .
#Text=" Katara says : " I wanted to do it .
#Text=I wanted to take out all my anger at him , but I could n't .
#Text=I do n't know if it 's because I 'm too weak to do it or because I 'm strong enough not to .
#Text=" Aang says : " You did the right thing .
#Text=Forgiveness is the first step you have to take to begin healing .
#Text=" Katara says : " But I did n't forgive him .
#Text=I 'll never forgive him .
#Text=But I am ready to forgive you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You were right about what Katara needed .
#Text=Violence was n't the answer .
#Text=" Aang says : " It never is .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Then I have a question for you .
#Text=What are you gon na do when you face my father ?
#Text="
